body.name: ZOSI C298 2.5K 4MP Dual-Lens Wired WiFi PT Security Camera Outdoor, Ultra-Wide Angle, Plug-in 360 Camera, 8X Hybrid Zoom, Person/Vehicle Detect, Spotlight Siren, Color Night Vision (128GB SD Card)
deliveryMessages: Delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 59 mins
features: (1). [ 4MP Dual-Lens WiFi PTZ Camera & Color Night Vision ] __ ZOSI 2.5K 4MP WiFi Pan & Tilt Camera merges a 4MP telephoto lens with an 8X electronic zoom-capable wide-angle lens for enhanced clarity in capturing crucial details from a distance. The 8mm telephoto lens captures intricate details, while the 2.8mm wide-angle lens provides a 355° panoramic view on one screen. Enjoy 3 night vision modes - Black & White, Full-color, Smart Night Vision - with a 30m range for security in the dark.

(2). [ AI Detection & Human Auto Tracking ] __ Leveraging advanced algorithms for intelligent detection, this ZOSI Dual-Lens WiFi PTZ Camera can automatically detect and distinguish between human and vehicle motion, initiating continuous tracking until the subject is no longer within the camera's line of sight. Upon detecting unusual activity, the motion-tracking cameras activate a white light alarm and instantly send push notifications and email alerts with screenshots.

(3). [ Two-way Audio & Customizable Voice Alerts ] __ ZOSI Dual-Lens wireless security camera features a built-in speaker and microphone, enabling real-time communication with visitors or deterring unwanted intruders remotely. Moreover, the outdoor camera allows you to define crucial monitoring zones and personalize voice alarms. Record a welcoming message for guests or issue warnings to prevent theft according to your preferences.

(4). [ Remote Access & Versatile Storage Choices ] __ Accessible from anywhere, individuals can view surveillance footage at any time through the ZOSI Smart app on their mobile phones. Share the dual-lens surveillance camera with your family to collectively safeguard your home. Choose from three recording storage options: micro-SD card (128 GB SD Card included), ZOSI NVR, or the convenient choice of cloud storage.

(5). [ More Stable WiFi Connection ] __ ZOSI dual-lens security camera offers flexibility with both 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz WiFi frequencies, ensuring a stable and fast connection. Its IP66 waterproof design allows it to function seamlessly in extreme weather conditions. Perfect for open areas such as parking lots, garages, backyards, and front yards, this outdoor wired security camera is built to withstand various environmental challenges.
